recipes.title: Wado Ichimonji Sword
lines: The §lWado Ichimonji§r is a sword of great personal importance to Roronoa Zoro, and it was once Kuina and her family's sword. It is also one of the 21 O Wazamono grade swords.

recipes.title: Sandai Kitetsu Sword
lines: The §lSandai Kitetsu§r is one of the Wazamono grade swords, a "Sharp Sword". Like all of its predecessor Kitetsu swords, this one is said to be cursed.
